channel.title: Some homebrew audio content
channel.description:
All of these are made in FL studio and if it contains any kind of solo, i made that on a guitar initially before porting it to midi.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/uwat.mp3 - My first experiment. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/platform.mp3 - Castlevania-influenced primitive version of an unfinished song http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/dm.mp3 - Pretty bad sounding test where i was curious on seeing how instrumental music (in this case death metal) would sound if made completely digitally. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/arialick0.mp3 - NES song. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/8bit.mp3 - More NES song! http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/orssm.mp3 - Even more NES!
If any of this falls into your liking, i can assist projects by providing music, sound effects etc for free.
Enjoy!

item.title: Some homebrew audio content
item.dc:creator: @TheIronDoorProject TheIronDoorProject
item.description:
@TheIronDoorProject wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:411363”]to brain damage: Here’s another sample, i think i got this one down much better:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/Music/rpgsample2.mp3[/quote]

Hey could u make me a theme tune for an rpg kinda medevil ?

item.title: Some homebrew audio content
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:7, topic:411363”][quote author=dain bramage link=topic=512626.msg3720880#msg3720880 date=1313929735]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=512626.msg3720860#msg3720860 date=1313926561]

Could you make something for open home areas (medieval rpg :P)?
Not slow, nor fast.

Thanks in advance.
[/quote]Something along the lines of this?
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/Music/rpgsample1.mp3

beautiful.
Very calming and great for a home ;D.
Could you trim the end of it for me, though?
[/quote]That was just an early start, i’m still working on making it a full song[/quote]
I reakon it would still sound good if even that short part was repeated over and over and ov…

Read full topic

item.title: Some homebrew audio content

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

All of these are made in FL studio and if it contains any kind of solo, i made that on a guitar initially before porting it to midi.

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/uwat.mp3 - My first experiment.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/platform.mp3 - Castlevania-influenced primitive version of an unfinished song
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/dm.mp3 - Pretty bad sounding test where i was curious on seeing how instrumental music (in this case death metal) would sound if made completely digitally.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/arialick0.mp3 - NES song.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/8bit.mp3 - More NES song!
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/NES/orssm.mp3 - Even more NES!

If any of this falls into your liking, i can assist projects by providing music, sound effects etc for free.

Enjoy!
